pkgmetadata.longdescription: A User-Friendly R 'shiny' Application for Multi-Omics Data Integration and Analysis // A 'shiny' application, which allows you to perform single- and multi-omics analyses using your own omics datasets. After the upload of the omics datasets and a metadata file, single-omics is performed for feature selection and dataset reduction. These datasets are used for pairwise- and multi-omics analyses, where automatic tuning is done to identify correlations between the datasets - the end goal of the recommended 'Holomics' workflow. Methods used in the package were implemented in the package 'mixomics' by Florian Rohart,Benot Gautier,Amrit Singh,Kim-Anh L Cao (2017) doi:10.1371/journal.pcbi.1005752 and are described there in further detail.
